claim: gary barnidge be draft before nick hayden
resp:

2. Sort the table by draft pick number in ascending order to determine the order of selection.
3. Compare the sorted positions of Gary Barnidge and Nick Hayden. If Gary Barnidge is above or on the same line as Nick Hayden, then Gary Barnidge was drafted before Nick Hayden.

|   round |   pick | player             | position   | school / club team   |
|--------:|-------:|:-------------------|:-----------|:---------------------|
|       1 |     13 | jonathan stewart   | rb         | oregon               |
|       1 |     19 | jeff otah          | ot         | pittsburgh           |
|       3 |     67 | charles godfrey    | cb         | iowa                 |
|       3 |     74 | dan connor         | lb         | penn state           |
|       5 |    141 | gary barnidge      | te         | louisville           |
|       6 |    181 | nick hayden        | dt         | wisconsin            |
|       7 |    221 | hilee taylor       | lb         | north carolina       |
|       7 |    241 | geoff schwartz     | ol         | oregon               |
|       7 |    250 | mackenzy bernadeau | g          | bentley              |

5. Compare the sorted positions of Gary Barnidge and Nick Hayden: Row 5 (Gary Barnidge) is before Row 6 (Nick Hayden).
